verses.roman:
dui hetu avatari' lañā bhakta-gaṇa
āpane āsvāde prema-nāma-saṅkīrtana

synonyms: dui—two; hetu—reasons; avatari'-incarnating; lañā—taking; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; āpane—Himself; āsvāde—tastes; prema—love of God; nāma-saṅkīrtana—and congregational chanting of the holy name.
translation: Thus with two intentions the Lord appeared with His devotees and tasted the nectar of prema with the congregational chanting of the holy name.
